replies.author: moses-minecraft
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-6-4 17:09
高频 execute @e[type=Pig] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=1] **********
************指什么

replies.author: moses-minecraft
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-6-4 17:09
高频 execute @e[type=Pig] ~ ~ ~ effect @a[r=1] **********
哦懂了
懂意思了，谢啦！
